QuestData.Title: A New Lesson for the Master
QuestData.Description: A new king of the mogu has arisen: Xin the Weaponmaster.$B$BHe single-handedly subjugated the mogu clans, and now they and their new leaders vie for his favor.$B$BI've never seen or read of any who are his equal in battle. Do not underestimate Xin, $n.$B$BOur fate rests in your hands.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay the new king of the mogu.
